oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Global Organic Food & Beverages Market to Reach USD 211.44 Billion by 2020
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Haakon, Johnson
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Food security, food quality and human health
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Global organic food & beverages market is expected to reach USD 211.44 billion by 2020, growing at a CAGR of 15.7% from 2014 to 2020. Growing adoption of organic food & beverages owing to associated health benefits and eco-friendly characteristics is expected to drive demand over the next six years. In addition, regulatory support for organic farming is also expected to have a positive influence on the market by improving supply and product quality.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Haakon, Johnson (editor): Haakon, Johnson (Ed.) (2014) Global Organic Food & Beverages Market to Reach USD 211.44 Billion by 2020. Grand View Research, Inc, San Francisco, California.
